name: 6X6 Truck Trails ( Wild Offroad Challenge )
description:
If you believe that Parking is just about finding the spot, Please rethink especially when it comes to heavy truck parking.
Take control of a powerful 6X6 truck and race through the obstacle course! BUT first you've gotta pass this test!

This game has beautiful locations and tracks that will test your driving skills of a 6X6 Truck Trails.

Game Features:

• Multiple driving missions with alternate objectives - prove your driving skills!
• Beautiful realistic 6X6 truck to drive - feel the handling and suspension!
• Real physics and handling - can you handle the power?!
• Amazing 3D world, full of details to explore
• Adjustable cameras give the perfect view.
• Parking has full iPhone 5 widescreen support!
